thread.section_title: BoxyMo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BoxyMo | www.boxymo.ie | 2 of 20
thread.title: Craig

author: Craig
title: Craig
text:
The insurance value is decent at a cheap cost however the monitoring system in the car is poorly defined and will not take into account your correction on the road for other users, for example, you may be judged incorrectly for breaking and turning and the system cannot take into account whether you've been cut off or if you have to move around a parked car at specific corners. Also there is no benefit to having a high score where other companies will provide you with money back for good driving.
The current customer service system is just terrible and its designed for them to contact you at their convienence without any warning at all. I was owed a refund and they insisted that I contact them, when I didn't they sent me a cheque out for the refund, I fail to see why they couldn't do this in the first place instead of insisting I contact them.
